description: Validate existing resource sheets against RSMS schema and update them to comply with latest standards
goal: Ensure all resource sheet documentation meets RSMS v1.0 specification
requirements: Validate all RESOURCE-SHEET-*.md files against schemas/resource-sheet.json
Update resource sheets with correct RSMS metadata (version, relationships, subject classification)
Generate validation report with compliance scores
out_of_scope: Creating new resource sheets from scratch
constraints: Must preserve existing content while updating metadata headers
No breaking changes to RSMS schema
